sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IStats } from 'src/app/interfaces/IStats'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stats', templateUrl: './stats.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stats.component.scss'] }) export class StatsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() stats: IStats = { totalOfCards: 0, numberOfDecks: 0, numberOfCardsSelected: 0, totalHP: 0, highLevelCard: 0, totalPrice: 0 }; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
Cards Stats
Total of Cards

{{ stats.totalOfCards }}

Number of Decks

{{ stats.numberOfDecks }}

Number of Cards Selected

{{ stats.numberOfCardsSelected }}

Average HP

{{ (stats.totalHP / stats.numberOfCardsSelected) | number:'1.0-0' }}

High Level Card

{{ stats.highLevelCard }}

Card Average Price

€ {{ (stats.totalPrice / stats.numberOfCardsSelected) | number:'1.0-2' }}
